p: Trypanosoma cruzi has three infective forms capable of infecting its host and currently six DTUs (discrete typing units) are recognized in the taxon. These DTUs correlate with mammalian hosts specific interactions in distinct time-space scales. We know relatively little about confirmed mammalian T. cruzi hosts in the US. More studies are needed to produce a comprehensive list of confirmed T. cruzi hosts as well as time-space scales for the operative interactions of hosts, vectors, and parasites.
